inclusion.criterion: Sleep History- Including that past 30 day detailed report
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic PSG history (copies of sleep studies)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Vital Signs (at beginning of PSG night)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Research Trial PSG- Randomized to one of the four devices
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: 30 day Take Home with Modified Philips BiPAP ASV device
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participants who are acutely ill, medically complicated or who are medically unstable
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Symptomatic chronic heart failure (NYHA 2-4) and reduced LVEF≤45%
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of COPD, OSA, obesity hypoventilation syndrome, dCHF. They are currently prescribed servo ventilation therapy at home with recent adherence and efficacy data from PAP device demonstrating. However, they have been hospitalized for heart failure within the last two months.
